body_html:
The prebuilt tensorflow binaries support CUDA 9.0 - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/releases/tag/v1.5.0

You have 3 options:

  1. Compile from source and link against CUDA 8.0.
  2. Upgrade your CUDA to 9.0
  3. Continue to user TF 1.4.

body:
The prebuilt tensorflow binaries support CUDA 9.0 - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/releases/tag/v1.5.0

You have 3 options:

1. Compile from source and link against CUDA 8.0.
2. Upgrade your CUDA to 9.0
3. Continue to user TF 1.4.
